definitions.definition: When the ball is kicked through the uprights and over the crossbar (not after a touchdown) for 3 points.
definitions.example: He kicked a 33 yard field goal just before the half.

definitions.definition: A made shot that was not a free throw.
definitions.example: He got six field goals in the first half, two from three-point land.

definitions.definition: A goal scored where a ball that is in play but on the ground is kicked through the uprights and over the crossbar.
One who speculates; an observer; a contemplator.
One who forms theories; a theorist.
One who speculates; as in investing, one who is willing to take volatile risks upon invested principal for the potential of substantial returns.
Any of various ornamental plants of the genus Impatiens.
To feel overwhelming fear.
To cause somebody to panic.
(by extension) To crash.
(by extension) To cause the system to crash.
A colourless solid hydrocarbon, C12H10, consisting of two benzene rings linked together by a single bond
Any substituted or otherwise altered version of biphenyl, such as PCBs
A food item prepared very sweet, frequently decorated in fine detail, and often preserved with sugar, such as a candy, sweetmeat, fruit preserve, pastry, or cake.
definitions.example: The table was covered with all sorts of tempting confections.

definitions.definition: The act or process of confecting; the process of making, compounding, or preparing something.
The result of such a process; something made up or confected; a concoction.
definitions.example: The defense attorney maintained that the charges were a confection of the local police.

definitions.definition: An artistic, musical, or literary work taken as frivolous, amusing, or contrived; a composition of a light nature.
Something, such as a garment or a decoration, seen as very elaborate, delicate, or luxurious, usually also seen as impractical or non-utilitarian.
A preparation of medicine sweetened with sugar, honey, syrup, or the like; an electuary.
To make into a confection, prepare as a confection.
A thing (used in a vague way to refer to something whose name one cannot recall).
Penis.
Slowed or weakened, as by drink, sleepiness, etc.
definitions.example: The medicine made him groggy and irritable.

definitions.definition: Of a horse: bearing wholly on its heels when trotting.
Of or pertaining to valves, such as those of the heart.
Like a valve.
Dandruff—scaly white dead skin flakes from the human scalp.
Hair follicles and dead skin shed from mammals.
Allergen particles that accumulate on and may be shed from the skin and fur of domestic animals, especially from household pets such as cats and dogs.
A cinder; (in the plural) the refuse of a furnace
Passion, temper, anger. Usually preceded by "have" or "get" and followed by "up".
definitions.example: He'll get his dander up if his team is criticized.

definitions.definition: To wander about.
To maunder, to talk incoherently.
A male who is insane or mentally disturbed.
Lacking energy, enthusiasm, or liveliness.
A rocky ledge or shelf.
To place on a shelf.
definitions.example: The library needs volunteers to help shelve books.

definitions.definition: To set aside; to quit or postpone.
definitions.example: They shelved the entire project when they heard how much it would cost.

definitions.definition: To furnish with shelves.
definitions.example: to shelve a closet or a library

definitions.definition: To take (drugs) by anal or vaginal insertion.
To have sex with.
To slope; to incline; to form into shelves.
A pale yellow or beige colour, like that of wheat.
Of, pertaining to, or made from wheat.
Of a pale yellow-beige colour, like that of wheat.
The area that runs alongside the court of play.
Located next to the court of play.
Alongside the court of play.
One of three yellowish-flowered Mediterranean herbs of the mustard family with flavoured leaves, often eaten in salads. Has a distinct, peppery flavor:
